hadiths.text: Narrated Maimuna:The Prophet (ﷺ) ate (a piece of) mutton from the shoulder region and then prayed without repeating the ablution

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ مَضْمَضَ مِنَ السَّوِيقِ وَلَمْ يَتَوَضَّأْ
chapter.eng-name: Rinsing one's mouth (with water) after eating As-Sawiq without repaying ablution
